item.title: About
item.description: About me Learning all the time, starving all the time. PGP key fingerprint: 0607 17ED 4DB8 1B0C 546B 3E8D 4A57 935B D3A7 3093 I am: a novice Emacs user and an ex-Vim user an Arch Linux user an amateur Programming Language linguist a Rustacean (hopefully) a gamer who mainly focuses on Nintendo platforms an Anime lover You can find me at: GitHub https://github.com/quinoa42 Bangumi https://bgm.tv/ MyAnimeList https://myanimelist.net/profile/quinoa42 About this site This site is powered by Hugo, a static website generator.

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: So start from today, here would be my temporary blog where I’ll write some notes about the things I learned.
